p: Original fastq datasets and intermediate datasets, and final results are archived and freely accessible at the University of Guelph Agri‚Äêenvironmental research data repository Dataverse ( https://dataverse.scholarsportal.info/dataverse/ugardr). Files include: Compressed file with all raw MiSeq sequencing results; Compressed file with Geneious merging results; Full ASV results from Geneious data and R script; CSV file with the accumulated results from the mBRAVE system.
